question: 35 weeks tomorrow! With 35 days tomorrow! I can't believe time has flown by! Hope everyone has fast, safe, and quick recovery! I'm already 60% effaced and 1cm dilated. Very exciting I didn't get room go in labor with my first live birth. I had to be induced due to preeclampsia at 35 weeks. But he was healthy and I recovered pretty fast.
title: almost time!
